Hi! I'm Saisawat Samutpradit. I'm a postdoctoral researcher at CREPE (University of Tokyo), and CReAM (University College London). My research interests are in labor and development economics. 
\
\

I will join the Department of Economics at Osaka University as a tenure-track assistant professor from April 2024.
